name: DailyMassReading
0:
”Alexa, open daily mass reading and say the gospel”
”Alexa, open daily mass reading”
”Read the gospel”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily mass reading
des: Can’t make it to Holy Mass? This Alexa skill offers the daily readings. It is also the perfect way to find time in your day for spiritual reflection.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
